text: Mike Hager (born November 5, 1962) was a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly until August, 2016 when he unexpectedly resigned. Hagehttp://www.ncga.state.nc.us/gascripts/members/viewMember.pl?sChamber=House&nUserID;=616 He represented the 112th district and had served as majority leader since January 2015.http://ncchamber.capwiz.com/bio/id/147032 Mike Hager now serves on the Rutherford County School Board. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:1962 births Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Mike Hager
